Absorber:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
Absorber:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

Absorber:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
Absorber:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
Absorber:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

Absorber:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
Absorber:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

Absorber:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
Absorber:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !Absorber:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

Absorber:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
Absorber:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !Absorber:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

Absorber:ConsumeDagger.NAME: Consume Dagger
Absorber:ConsumeDagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Fatal: Add a card to your card reward pool Exhaust
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: to your card reward pool Exhaust

Absorber:BloodyFeather.NAME: Bloody Feather
Absorber:BloodyFeather.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage(increases by !M! per turn) exhaust

Absorber:StimNeedle.NAME: Stim Needle
Absorber:StimNeedle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage gain !M! mana and !M! extra cards next turn

Absorber:DrainDamage.NAME: Drain Damage
Absorber:DrainDamage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! X damage where X is the amount of absorber:Drain done this combat Exhaust
Absorber:DrainDamage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! 2*X damage where X is the amount of absorber:Drain done this combat Exhaust

Absorber:DrainLash.NAME: Drain Lash
Absorber:DrainLash.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you absorber:Drain, deal !M! damage to all enemies

Absorber:HealthDrain.NAME: Health Drain
Absorber:HealthDrain.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP on your Turn, absorber:Drain !Absorber:DrainVariable!

Absorber:ChosenAttack.NAME: Chosen Attack
Absorber:ChosenAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the target is not attacking, gain !M! artifact

Absorber:GremlinRally.NAME: Gremlin Rally
Absorber:GremlinRally.DESCRIPTION: Add a Gremlin Stabs to your hand at the beginning of each turn
Absorber:GremlinRally.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an upgraded Gremlin Stabs to your hand at the beginning of each turn

Absorber:LagavulinDrain.NAME: Lagavulin Drain
Absorber:LagavulinDrain.DESCRIPTION: absorber:Drain !M! and absorber:Drain !M! strength from target Exhaust

Absorber:LooterDagger.NAME: Looter Dagger
Absorber:LooterDagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, gain gold equal to unblocked damage

Absorber:Harden.NAME: Harden
Absorber:Harden.DESCRIPTION: The first time you take damage each turn, Gain 6 block

Absorber:PrepareOperation.NAME: Prepare Operation
Absorber:PrepareOperation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and next turn Gain !M! Energy

Absorber:GiantHeadSlam.NAME: Giant Head Slam
Absorber:GiantHeadSlam.DESCRIPTION: After the 5th turn, this card deals !D! damage

Absorber:OrbSpray.NAME: Orb Spray
Absorber:OrbSpray.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ( !M! damage per turn) to all enemies

Absorber:SphericShield.NAME: Spherical Shield
Absorber:SphericShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Block is not removed at the start of your next turn Exhaust

Absorber:Prepare.NAME: Prepare
Absorber:Prepare.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and retain !M! card(s) this turn

Absorber:VolatileSteroid.NAME: Volatile Steroid
Absorber:VolatileSteroid.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. Take another turn after this one exhaust NL End your Turn

Absorber:LifeSupport.NAME: Life Support
Absorber:LifeSupport.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the Turn, absorber:Drain !Absorber:DrainVariable! from all enemies
Absorber:LifeSupport.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL At the end of the Turn, absorber:Drain !Absorber:DrainVariable! from all enemies

Absorber:BloodTransfusion.NAME: Blood Transfusion
Absorber:BloodTransfusion.DESCRIPTION: Take !M! damage, Gain !Absorber:SecondMagic! temp Strength and !Absorber:SecondMagic! temp Dexterity exhaust

Absorber:ForcedBloodTransfusion.NAME: Forced Transfusion
Absorber:ForcedBloodTransfusion.DESCRIPTION: Take !M! damage, Apply !Absorber:SecondMagic! weak and !Absorber:SecondMagic! vulnerable to each enemy exhaust

Absorber:Sharpen.NAME: Sharpen
Absorber:Sharpen.DESCRIPTION: Buff Each Attack in your hand by !M! Damage

Absorber:NeverEndingWall.NAME: Never Ending Wall
Absorber:NeverEndingWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, increase this amount for all Never Ending Walls by !M! this combat

Absorber:Crystallize.NAME: Crystallize
Absorber:Crystallize.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, deal double damage next turn, end you turn exhaust

Absorber:BeatDown.NAME: BeatDown
Absorber:BeatDown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and Enemy loses !M! strength for the rest of the turn

Absorber:GremlinArmy.NAME: Gremlin Army
Absorber:GremlinArmy.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Gremlin Stabs to your hand next turn

Absorber:SentrySlam.NAME: Sentry Slam
Absorber:SentrySlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, attack twice on odd turns

Absorber:WideSwing.NAME: Wide Swing
Absorber:WideSwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and !Absorber:DrainVariable! absorber:drain from all enemies

Absorber:SetupSkill.NAME: Steady Hands
Absorber:SetupSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! absorber:protected, and Next turn gain !M! energy and retain !M! cards

Absorber:EnergySurge.NAME: Energy Surge
Absorber:EnergySurge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! times X damage NL Deal double when energy is above !Absorber:MaxEnergy!

Absorber:ManicAttack.NAME: Manic Attack
Absorber:ManicAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deals !D! damage 4 times(double damage below 50% hp)

Absorber:OverExert.NAME: Over Exert
Absorber:OverExert.DESCRIPTION: Costs less energy for every energy spent on Attacks this turn NL Deals !D! damage, Next turn, Draw !M! less cards next turn

Absorber:Adrenaline.NAME: Adrenaline
Absorber:Adrenaline.DESCRIPTION: Convert all damage this turn into damage taken at the end of next turn NL Draw !M! cards Exhaust

Absorber:Overdose.NAME: Overdose
Absorber:Overdose.DESCRIPTION: Gain !Absorber:SecondMagic! energy and take !M! damage next turn

Absorber:ExperimentVaccine.NAME: Experimental Vaccine
Absorber:ExperimentVaccine.DESCRIPTION: Gain !Absorber:SecondMagic! Max-HP and lose !M! HP Exhaust

Absorber:Draw_Attack.NAME: Draw Attack
Absorber:Draw_Attack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, draw !M! cards NL absorber:Stimulated:Draw !Absorber:SecondMagic! cards instead

Absorber:SurgicalPrecision.NAME: Surgical Precision
Absorber:SurgicalPrecision.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL absorber:Stimulated: Gain !M! energy and draw !M! card

Absorber:EnergyWall.NAME: Energy Wall
Absorber:EnergyWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block NL absorber:Stimulated: Gain !M! extra Block

Absorber:GremlinSmashCard.NAME: Gremlin Smash
Absorber:GremlinSmashCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage NL absorber:Stimulated: Apply !M! Vulnerable

Absorber:ReptoDaggerB.NAME: Blue Dagger
Absorber:ReptoDaggerB.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Draw !M! Cards Exhaust

Absorber:ReptoDaggerG.NAME: Green Dagger
Absorber:ReptoDaggerG.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Gain !B! Block Exhaust

Absorber:ReptoDaggerP.NAME: Purple Dagger
Absorber:ReptoDaggerP.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Add !M! miracle to your hand

Absorber:ReptoDaggerM.NAME: MultiDagger
Absorber:ReptoDaggerM.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, Draw !M! cards, Gain !B! block, Add !M! Miracle to your hand

Absorber:ReptoDag.NAME: Reptomancer Daggers
Absorber:ReptoDag.DESCRIPTION: Choose A Dagger NL absorber:Stimulated Combine the Daggers
